game.name: Drag Race
game.description:
A drag race is an ultimate treat for all racing game lovers. One of the best intricate, exciting free online games to play for boys, this gaming activity features high-quality graphics and is sure to give you an amazing bike riding experience online. Give your opponent the strong threat and leave them behind while maneuvering your motorcycle at good speed. 

Are you ready to participate in the toughest bike racing competition ever and become a race winner? Without making any more delays, just start now playing the world most popular free online racing game ? Drag Race. The entire world of online gamer are playing and enjoying all the levels of this cool flash game. This addictive motorcycle racing game is filled with the unlimited fun and excitement for you. 

Ride your bike at high speed and defeat your opponent to reach the next level of this bike racing game for boys. Do not forget to collect the engine fuel, earn money and enjoy the respect you receive while crossing each level. Get ready to beat the best in this competition. Stand against your might rival with your exclusive driving skills and beautifully-designed bike. So, gear up for the big competition and show the entire world what you have got!
